title: wait time
body: whats with the 30 -60 min wait times for rank games its ridiculous

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, especially considering you're in bronze 5.

* Are you choosing a role that is commonly wanted by players, thus hard to get. (mid, top, adc)
* Do you currently have a leaverbuster punishment that has pushed you into low priority or given you a wait time before you can queue?
